title: Bismarck, North Dakota
summary: Bismarck (/ˈbɪzmɑːrk/) is the capital of the U.S. state of North Dakota and the county seat of Burleigh County.[4]  It is the second-most populous city in North Dakota after Fargo. The city's population was census in 2020 at 73,622, while its metropolitan population was 133,626. In 2020, Forbes magazine ranked Bismarck as the seventh fastest-growing small city in the United States.[5][6]
